mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.cust_id, c.item_id as c_item_id, c.count, c.reg_date, i.item_id AS i_item_id, i.item_name AS i_item_name, i.item_price AS i_item_price, i.img_name AS i_img_name, i.reg_date AS i_reg_date, i.update_date AS i_update_date FROM cart c JOIN item i ON c.item_id = i.item_id WHERE c.cart_id = #{cartId}

SELECT c.cart_id, c.cust_id, c.item_id, c.count, c.reg_date, i.item_id AS i_item_id, i.item_name AS i_item_name, i.item_price AS i_item_price, i.img_name AS i_img_name, i.reg_date AS i_reg_date, i.update_date AS i_update_date FROM cart c JOIN item i ON c.item_id = i.item_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cust_id, item_id, count) VALUES (#{custId}, #{itemId}, #{count})
